channel.title: C++ on Kyle Simpson
channel.description: Recent content in C++ on Kyle Simpson

item.title: Graph Models and Maximum Common Subgraph for Character Analysis
item.description: An investigation into graph models within computer vision—the project provides a criticism of existing general techniques reliant upon the Delaunay triangulation. I also propose and investigate techniques for modelling and recognition of characters, against several well-known handwritten datasets as well as a sampling of fonts. The attached paper constitutes my Masters dissertation.
